```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(lme4)
library(lmerTest)
```

```{r}
df <- read_csv(
  "merged_df.csv",
  col_types = list(
    uniqueid = col_factor()
  ))
glimpse(df)
```

```{r}
filtered_df <- df %>% filter(!slider_copout, !(condition_0 %in% c("practice", "filler")))
```

```{r}
# contr.sum with logical variables makes FALSE = 1, TRUE = -1, which is confusing.
contrasts(filtered_df$agent_is_subject) = c(-1, 1)
contrasts(filtered_df$agent_is_given) = c(-1, 1)
contrasts(filtered_df$`A concrete?`) = c(-1, 1)
```


```{r}
model <- lmer(slider_value ~ agent_is_given * agent_is_subject +
                `A concrete?` * agent_is_subject + 
                `A concrete?` * agent_is_given +
                (agent_is_given * agent_is_subject|item_id) + 
                (agent_is_given * agent_is_subject|uniqueid),
              data=filtered_df,
              control=lmerControl(optimizer="bobyqa", optCtrl=list(maxfun=100000)))
summary(model)
```
```{r}
ranef(model)
```
```{r}
library(brms)
```

```{r}
filtered_df_trans <- filtered_df %>% 
  mutate(slider_value = (slider_value + 0.1) / 100.2,
         agent_is_concrete=`A concrete?`)
model.brm <- brm(slider_value ~ agent_is_given * agent_is_subject +
                   agent_is_concrete * agent_is_subject + 
                   (agent_is_given * agent_is_subject|item_id) + 
                   (agent_is_given * agent_is_subject|uniqueid),
                 data=filtered_df_trans, family="beta")
```
```{r}
summary(model.brm)
```
